name: Proof_317 — Evening Duck Welfare Check (2025-12-11, 16:44)
description:
At 16:44 on 2025-12-11, an evening welfare check was conducted on the remaining three ducks at MaMeeFarm.  
The inspection verified feed availability, water presence, enclosure conditions, and general behavior stability within the flock.

This record serves as verifiable evidence of routine animal welfare monitoring under the DGCP™ continuous proof system.

License: DGCP | MMFARM-POL-2025
